item.title: Making Available finally recognized for the sham it is
item.description:
From A Groklaw article today:

In Atlantic v. Brennan, the courts have finally recognized RIAA’s “making available” argument for the sham it is. Groklaw has a link to the full ruling, which includes:

At least one aspect of Plaintiffs’ distribution claim is problematic, however, namely the allegation of infringement …
